body:
Hoi Avicus, I know that this letter can not be posted on the conversation, i don't care :P butt i'm banned from the server for nothing... am i to good for pvp???? plu urban me my user name is: VoidHero

PS; this server is awesome

replies.body: I would appeal an infraction, since this will be locked. Appeal here. Good luck!

replies.body:
Hello VoidHero,

Please appeal your infraction here: https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50
Be sure to follow the format. 

For future references, do not post threads like this in the Avicus Lounge. 

Locking...

Thanks,
FrostedCupcakez
